description.value:
Your senses improve as you gain feline eyes, ears, and whiskers. You gain darkvision and electromagnetic scent as an imprecise sense out to 30 feet, allowing you to detect living and technological creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Feline Senses]

Heightened (4th) The spell's range is touch and it targets 1 willing creature.

Heightened (6th) The spell's range is touch and it targets 1 willing creature. The duration is until your next daily preparations.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Feline Senses (6th-Rank)]
